# Heart Health and Unani Medicine: Debunking Common Myths

## Introduction

Heart health is a critical aspect of our overall well-being, and maintaining a healthy heart is essential for longevity and quality of life. While many modern treatments and medications are available, some individuals turn to alternative systems of medicine, such as Unani medicine, for heart health support. However, several misconceptions surround Unani medicine and its impact on heart health. This article aims to debunk common myths surrounding Unani medicine and heart health.
